snippet: After the first season-opening loss by a defending champion in 13 years, the Giants appear eager to redeem themselves at home Sunday against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
abstract: New York Giants cornerback Prince Amukamara, who has just returned to practice after an ankle injury, expresses disappointment in the team's performance in the season opener against the Dallas Cowboys; defeat was the first time in 13 years that a Super Bowl champion failed to win their following season opener.
lead_paragraph: After the first season-opening loss by a defending champion in 13 years, the Giants appear eager to redeem themselves at home Sunday against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.

headline.seo: After Loss in Opener, Giants Seek Redemption
headline.main: After Loss in Opener, Giants Seek Redemption
headline.print_headline: Giants Seek Redemption; Amukamara Seeks Return
